SubItem.Name: 上周五至今
SubItem.Condition: where ShakeDate > '{fromLastFriday}' and Note like '%走势%'

SubItem.Name: 全部
SubItem.Condition: where Note like '%鸡蛋%' or Note like '%玉米%' or Note like '%螺纹%' or Note like '%郑煤%' or Note like '%豆粕%' or Note like '%菜粕%'

Item.Name: 他人事
Item.Condition: where Note not like '%自己%' and Note not like'%走势%'

Item.Name: 手机起卦
Item.Condition: where Note like '%锤子%' or Note like'%手机%'
